SettingsItem.Name: Match consumer product individuals selection to population definition options
SettingsItem.Description: Match consumer product individuals selection to population definition. Use population definitions (default), ignore all population definitions or use a selection of properties.

SettingsItem.Name: Select one or more individual properties to filter the population
SettingsItem.Description: Select one or more individual properties to filter the individuals in the population.

SettingsItem.Name: Use sampling weights
SettingsItem.Description: If checked, individual sampling weights are used. If unchecked, the individual sampling weights are not in the calculations.

SettingsItem.Name: Resample consumer product individuals
SettingsItem.Description: Consumer product individual data are resampled from the original database using the bootstrap methodology (Efron 1979, Efron & Tibshirani 1993).
